body:
I can see different value of my last transaction in the wallet Bitcoin Core 0.10.1 and in the Blockchain.
Look at the screenshot from the wallet (the attachment) and compare it to:
https://blockchain.info/tx/923edf4f1e0a5da5e0995f0dcca04152c06af094e67d5d49571ba7984bbe0e15

The difference is strange and I can't understand why (over 1.5 year in Bitcoin network and I can see first time something similar). I didn't ask yet our technicians, firstly I would like to have your opinion about it. I turned off the wallet immediately (after first confirmation) when i saw that in Blockchain.org the value is completely different. I'm more a Bitcoin investor than a Bitcoin programmer, but I take care seriously about security on my computers.  

Does have anyone an idea what is it (an error in Blockchain or a theft) and what to do with it? 
![transaction-on-the-wallet-clear](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/10259280/7425228/4602cdf2-efad-11e4-81fb-d88a14eb9b21.png)
title: Different values of a single TX in the wallet Core 0.10.1 and in blockchain?
